Identification.ShortTitle: Access to Information Act Heads of Government Institutions Designation Order
Identification.LongTitle: Order Respecting the Designation of the Heads of Government Institutions for the Purposes of the Access to Information Act

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, is pleased hereby, pursuant to paragraph (b) of the definition head in section 3 of the Access to Information Act*, to make the annexed Order respecting the designation of the heads of government institutions for the purposes of the Access to Information Act.

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Access to Information Act Heads of Government Institutions Designation Order.

The person holding a position set out in Column II of an item of the schedule is hereby designated, for the purposes of the Access to Information Act, as the head of the government institution set out in Column I of that item.

BilingualGroup.BilingualItemFr: Conseil consultatif de la situation de la femme

Agence de promotion économique du Canada atlantique
